# npm-package-info.json - LLM-Optimized Format
# Generated by jsonToLLMString function
# This shows how the JSON is transformed for better LLM comprehension
# 
# Key improvements:
# - Arrays as "LIST:" format instead of brackets
# - Semantic labels (Repository, Owner, FilePath, etc.)
# - Boolean values as "yes/no" instead of "true/false"
# - Eliminated JSON syntax noise (quotes, brackets, braces)
# - Zero data loss with enhanced readability
#
# ====================================================================

_comment: ðŸ“¦ NPM Package Information Example
_description: This file contains a comprehensive NPM package.json response that tests jsonToLLMString with: (1) Complex dependencies and devDependencies objects, (2) Scripts object with numerous build/test commands, (3) Contributor arrays with nested objects, (4) Export maps with conditional exports, (5) Funding arrays with multiple platforms, (6) Keywords arrays for SEO, (7) Maintenance metadata and distribution info. This represents a real-world enterprise NPM package configuration.
_test_cases: Tests object flattening (dependencies), array handling (contributors->LIST), semantic labeling (name->Name), and nested export configurations
Name: @octocode/advanced-toolkit
Version: 3.14.159
Description: A comprehensive toolkit for advanced code analysis, transformation, and optimization with AI-powered features
Main: dist/index.js
Module: dist/index.esm.js
Types: dist/index.d.ts
Files: LIST: dist/**/*, src/**/*, README.md, LICENSE, CHANGELOG.md, examples/**/*
Exports:
  .:
    Import: ./dist/index.esm.js
    Require: ./dist/index.js
    Types: ./dist/index.d.ts
  ./analyzer:
    Import: ./dist/analyzer.esm.js
    Require: ./dist/analyzer.js
    Types: ./dist/analyzer.d.ts
  ./transformer:
    Import: ./dist/transformer.esm.js
    Require: ./dist/transformer.js
    Types: ./dist/transformer.d.ts
  ./utils:
    Import: ./dist/utils.esm.js
    Require: ./dist/utils.js
    Types: ./dist/utils.d.ts
Scripts:
  Build: rollup -c rollup.config.js && npm run build:types
  Build:dev: rollup -c rollup.config.js --watch
  Build:types: tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap
  Build:docs: typedoc --out docs src/index.ts
  Test: vitest run --coverage --reporter=verbose
  Test:watch: vitest --watch --ui
  Test:e2e: playwright test
  Test:integration: vitest run tests/integration --reporter=verbose
  Lint: eslint src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx} --fix
  Lint:check: eslint src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx}
  Format: prettier --write "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md}"
  Format:check: prettier --check "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md}"
  Typecheck: tsc --noEmit
  Clean: rimraf dist coverage .nyc_output
  Prepare: husky install && npm run build
  PrepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
  Release: semantic-release
  Benchmark: node benchmarks/run.js
  Analyze: npm run build && npx bundle-analyzer dist/index.js
  Dev: concurrently "npm run build:dev" "npm run test:watch"
  Start: node dist/index.js
  Demo: node examples/demo.js
